display_name: Medical Outcomes Study SF-36: Health limits moderate activity
description:
Item from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/cfs/variables?search=mossf36)

Original question: *Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf*
